page.title: 16CAREY PARC HOUSING ESTATE
page.content: Carey Parc is a modern housing development in Mullion.Building started 15 years ago, and from time to time houses are still built here.The houses are timber-framed, with wooden cladding front and back.The end walls are of local stone. At present there are 132 houses on the estate. On the 16th July 1985 there were 8 houses for sale. The occupants of 4 of them had already moved, leaving the houses empty. One was being used as a holiday home. One person refused to answer our questions. The occupants of the other two were moving for different reasons.One was a young woman who had no work. She had lived in Mullion for 16 years, and was moving 9 miles to Helston. The other was an old lady who had lived in Mullion for 6 years.She needed a larger house. If she has to leave the village she will be unhappy.
